summary: Dusty insists on staying near Tel Mithrym and she dont want travel more... until now!
descriptionHtml:
Dusty insists on staying near Tel Mithrym and she dont want travel more... until now!
You are the Dragonborn, and you can convince Dusty to travel again.
Maybe Dusty knew that you was going to come; Maybe Dusty was waiting... for you.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As much of you, i was very disappointed that I could not travel around with Dusty when I first saw her.
For that, i was usingÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56638/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D56638%26preview%3D&pUp=1]The Old Dusty Travels Again Mod by Kursan[/url], but i want a little more. ;)
And well, here is this mod.

Travel to:
-Tel Mithrym (near, original place)
-Raven Rock
-Skaal Village (near)
-Glacial Cave
-Bristleback Cave
-Altar of Thrond (near)

Installation:
Extract .zip in Data folder.

Todo:
-Dusty maps markers.
-Recall Dusty system.
-A dialog line for Revus Sarvani, something little about Dusty travelling again.
author: AbbaddoN33
